message: I have a high-quality product for $100, which is a great deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for a low price, but you have to make a decision quickly. If you buy it, you'll get a high-quality product that will exceed your expectations. If you don't buy it, I'll have to sell it to someone else, and you might miss out on a great opportunity.
